imdb.plot outline: NBA All-Star Kevin Love joins sports yoga instructor Kent Katich for four dynamic, athletic yoga practices designed to build flexibility, balance and competitive focus. Katich has coached some of the best athletes in the world, using yoga to elevate their physical performance and mental edge.
imdb.title: Gaiam: Athletic Yoga, Yoga for Flexibility w/Kevin Love
plot: NBA All-Star Kevin Love joins sports yoga instructor Kent Katich for four dynamic, athletic yoga practices designed to build flexibility, balance and competitive focus.

NBA All-Star Kevin Love joins sports yoga instructor Kent Katich for four dynamic, athletic yoga practices designed to build flexibility, balance and competitive focus. Katich has coached some of the best athletes in the world, using yoga to elevate their physical performance and mental edge.
